mapper.insert: insert into post values(default, #{uid}, default, #{author}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 0, null, default, null)
mapper.select: select * from post where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
select * from post where author like concat('%', #{nickname}, '%')
select * from post order by hits desc;
select * from post order by likes desc;
select * from post order by publishedtime;
mapper.update: update post set hits = hits + 1 where pid = #{pid}
update post set likes = likes + 1 where pid = #{pid}
update post set likes = likes - 1 where pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: select name from tag join taglist on tag.tid = taglist.tid where taglist.pid = #{pid};
